    Specify options for a musicassessr test.

    musicassessr_opt.Rd

    Specify options for a musicassessr test.

    Usage

    musicassessr_opt(
  setup_pages = TRUE,
  setup_options = setup_pages_options(),
  use_musicassessr_db = FALSE,
  app_name = "",
  midi_file_playback = FALSE,
  visual_notation = FALSE,
  record_audio = TRUE,
  midi_input = FALSE,
  fake_range = TRUE,
  musicassessr_aws = FALSE,
  experiment_id = NULL,
  experiment_condition_id = NULL,
  user_id = NULL,
  instrument_id = NULL,
  get_p_id = FALSE
)

    Arguments

    setup_pages

    Should there be setup pages?

    setup_options

    Setup page options.

    use_musicassessr_db

    Is a SQL backend being used?

    app_name

    App name for audio recording apps.

    midi_file_playback

    Will MIDI files need to be played back?

    visual_notation

    Will there be visual notation?

    record_audio

    Is audio recording required?

    midi_input

    Is MIDI input required?

    fake_range

    Should the vocal/instrument range be faked?

    musicassessr_aws

    Is this being run on Amazon Web Services (AWS)?

    experiment_id

    An experiment ID.

    experiment_condition_id

    An experiment condition ID.

    user_id

    A user ID.

    instrument_id

    An instrument ID.

    get_p_id

    Should a participant ID get collected at the beginning of the test?

    On this page

    Developed by Sebastian Silas.
